scriptinfo.init: local tbl = {['AMGPack'] = {27091275, 28796661}} local rs = game:GetService('ReplicatedStorage') local players = game:GetService('Players') local productInfo = require(rs.Modules.ProductInfo) local event = rs.Analytics.UpdateProductInfo for name, val in pairs(tbl) do productInfo.Gamepasses[name] = val event:FireAllClients(name, val) end players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(plr) for name, val in pairs(tbl) do event:FireClient(plr, name, val) end end)
